column1: '''Holman the greenhanded''' was a famous gardener of [[the Shire]].
Holman of [[Hobbiton]] had five children; [[Rowan]], [[Halfred Greenhand
column3: Rose]]. He passed his skills and crafts on to his eldest son, Halfred, who formed the surname [[Greenhand Family
column4: Greenhand]] out of his father's nickname.<ref>{{App

column1: Holman means "hole-man", and is distinct from the real-life English surname<ref name="Nomen">{{HM
column2: N}}, p. 760</ref> which contains ''holm'' "river island" rather than ''hol'' "hole".<ref>{{HM
